# Introduction

In this section, we will create an `R` package ([`GPcov`](https://github.com/avramaral/GPcov/)) that compute the covariance function for Gaussian Processes with different dependence structures. Also, we will create a [website](https://avramaral.github.io/GPcov/) for our package using `pkgdown`.
